definition: treat the body or any part of it by wrapping it, as with blankets or sheets, and applying compresses to it, or stuffing it to provide cover, containment, or therapy, or to absorb blood; "The nurse packed gauze in the wound"; "You had better pack your swollen ankle with ice"

subcats: They %s the car down the avenue
The men %s the horses across the field
They %s the bags on the table

subject: verb.body
